buffDesc: At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 <link="dc|999"><u>Seal of Power</u></link> stacks. After dealing weakness damage to a foe, gain 1 more stack. At the end of turn, lose 1 stack. During battle, gain the effects of <link="dc|237"><u>Stable Domain</u></link>.

When a skill is used or Resonance is activated, gain 1 Seal of Power stack. After all ally actions, increase final damage by 15% for each Seal of Power stack, and then lose 1 stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

At the start of each turn, gain 1 Seal of Power for each max HP increase. Gain 1 Seal of Power stack when dealing damage with a Resonance. Seal of Power: Increase final damage by 10% for each stack. Stacks up to 3 times.

When Resonance deals damage, inflict target with 1 <link="dc|171"><u>Magnetic Interference</u></link> stack.
During battle, gain the effects of <link="dc|237"><u>Stable Domain</u></link>.

When a Strategist ally uses a buff skill, grant all allies <link="dc|175"><u>Yang Energy</u></link>. When a Saboteur ally uses a debuff skill, grant all allies <link="dc|176"><u>Yang Energy</u></link>.
After all allies have acted, all foes are inflicted with an elemental ailment, and their taken damage increases by 10%.
Increase Elucidator allies' stat buff effects by 30% and increase weakness damage by 20%.
When an ally uses a Highlight, grant all allies 1 <link="dc|189"><u>Mark of Augmentation</u></link> stack.

When an ally spends HP to use a skill, they obtain 4 stacks of <link="dc|191"><u>Blood's Grace</u></link>. When allies activate a Highlight, all allies get 2 stacks of Blood's Grace. Lose 1 stack of Blood's Grace at the end of each turn.
When a Resonance deals damage or heals allies, or when HP is spent to activate a skill, all allies gain 1 <link="dc|195"><u>Mental Link</u></link> stack.
When Resonance deals damage, gain Wild Fury. Wild Fury: Increase final damage by 20% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.
When an ally spends their own HP to activate a skill, they gain 1 <link="dc|200"><u>Bloodbath Blessing</u></link> stack.
Increase Elucidator's stat buff effects by 30%. When an ally deals weakness damage, they gain Tremor Amplification.Tremor Amplification: Increase final damage by 40% for 2 turns.
When an ally gains a shield or deals weakness damage, gain <link="dc|204"><u>Charge Field</u></link>.
When an ally deals weakness damage, they gain 4 <link="dc|205"><u>Charge Field</u></link> stacks. When an ally gains a shield, they gain 1 <link="dc|205"><u>Charge Field</u></link> stack.

At the start of battle, all allies gain 2 <link="dc|208"><u>Electromagnetic Dissociation</u></link> stacks. After dealing weakness damage to a foe, gain 1 more stack. At the end of turn, automatically lose 1 stack.
After dealing damage with skills or Resonance, gain 1 Impact stack. Impact: Deal 5% final damage for each stack. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.
